SENT.plain: 16 patients with transient global amnesia (TGA) have been investigated by computer tomography
3 had a completed stroke associated with the TGA
The findings of computer tomography were normal in 7 patients
Atrophy alone was seen in 2 patients
A single hypodense lesion was found in 6 patients; a bilateral lesion in 1 patient
All 3 patients with amnesic stroke showed a hypodense lesion in the CT
